live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

BC Hydro is still reporting unplanned outages due to wildfire activity and they have not provided an ETR at this time. Restoration efforts may also be delayed due to road closures and evacuation orders in the area.  We will provide further updates as they become available.
Services are disrupted due to Hydro outages caused by wildfire activity. Technicians will work to repair services once power is restored, and when it has been deemed safe to access the area.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
